title: Periodic waves - A and T from cosine equations

content.description: Two waves, Wave <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and Wave <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, are propagating through different regions of space.
content.question: The displacement <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> at specific locations within each wave can be described, as a function of time <math skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
